name: Bloodstoke Howler
originalText:
Morph {6}{R} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Bloodstoke Howler is turned face up, Beasts you control get +3/+0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: The trigger occurs when you use the Morph ability to turn the card face up, or when an effect turns it face up. It will not trigger on being revealed or on leaving the battlefield.
